title: User Signup with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully create a new account using valid signup credentials and that the session is started.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup screen.
Enter valid user details including email and password.
Submit the signup form.
Confirm a successful signup confirmation message is shown.
Verify that the user is logged in and redirected to the personalized dashboard.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that users can log in successfully using valid registered credentials and that session management works correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen.
Enter valid registered username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is successful and the user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify that the session is maintained across page reloads.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails gracefully with incorrect credentials and the user is notified appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen.
Enter an invalid email or password combination.
Click the login button.
Verify error message describing invalid login credentials is displayed.
Confirm that user is not logged in and remains on the login screen.

title: AI-Powered Language Exercise Generation
description: Validate that the AI service generates personalized language learning exercises dynamically based on the user's progress and preferences.

steps.description: Log in with an existing user account with recorded progress.
Navigate to the exercise generation section.
Request new language exercise.
Verify that the exercise content is dynamically generated and differs per request.
Validate exercise difficulty and topic align with user's prior progress data.

title: Handle AI Service Failure Gracefully
description: Ensure the application handles AI service failures without crashing and informs the user with an appropriate fallback message.

steps.description: Simulate AI service downtime or failure.
Attempt to generate a new language exercise.
Verify the app shows a user-friendly error message or fallback option.
Ensure the application remains responsive and stable without crashing.

title: Track and Save User Progress after Exercise Completion
description: Check that upon completion of language exercises, user progress data is accurately saved and reflected in the progress dashboard.

steps.description: Log in and start a language exercise.
Complete the exercise with valid answers.
Submit exercise completion.
Verify progress data is saved to the backend and local database.
Confirm progress dashboard updates to reflect new progress and statistics.

title: Progress Tracking Persistence Across Sessions
description: Validate that user progress data can be consistently retrieved and displayed correctly across multiple login sessions.

steps.description: Log in as a returning user.
Verify that progress dashboard loads and accurately displays historical progress data.
Log out and log back in.
Confirm the progress data persists and displays correctly after relogin.

title: Electron App Window Creation and Lifecycle Management
description: Test that the Electron main process correctly manages app window creation, lifecycle events including open, close, and minimize on supported platforms.

steps.description: Launch the Electron app.
Verify main window is created and visible.
Minimize and restore the app window.
Confirm the window correctly restores to prior state.
Close the app window.
Ensure the app exits cleanly without errors.

title: Local Database Initialization and Data Storage
description: Verify that the application initializes the local database correctly on first run and that data can be stored and retrieved without corruption.

steps.description: Delete any existing local database files or data.
Launch the app to trigger database initialization.
Check that local database files or store are created successfully.
Perform a data save operation such as saving user progress.
Verify data is accurately stored and can be queried from the local database.

title: Responsive UI and Component Rendering
description: Confirm that UI components render correctly and responsively across different window sizes and devices with correct Tailwind CSS styling and Framer Motion animations.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate to dashboard and exercise screens.
Resize the application window across a range of sizes including typical desktop and small laptop dimensions.
Verify that components adjust layout responsively and maintain usability.
Confirm animations run smoothly without jank or freezing.

title: Application Routing Based on Authentication State
description: Test that routing using React Router correctly directs the user to login or dashboard views based on authentication status.

steps.description: Start the app with no authenticated user session.
Ensure routing directs the user to the login or signup page.
Log in with valid credentials.
Confirm routing navigates user to the personalized dashboard.
Log out.
Verify that user is redirected back to the login screen.

title: Logout Functionality and Session Termination
description: Check that users can log out successfully using the provided UI and that the session is invalidated properly.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user.
Use the logout feature in the application UI.
Confirm the user session is terminated.
Verify the app routes to the login screen post logout.
